text: I loved researching about fluid typography while I was writing a blog post a little while back but yeah actually getting to implement it has not been promising. Itâ€™s unfortunate

I've done some basic stuff, mostly to accommodate for huge screens (5k iMacs and the like). Excited to use these for an upcoming (non-HS) personal project: <https://www.npmjs.com/package/postcss-responsive-type>
